title: No Hextech Chests?!
body: Recently not sure when exactly I stopped getting chests, I don't know if this is a bug or anything but I have all chests available and people on my team are getting S but I'm not getting any chests! Help Pls :D

replies.body:
There's a few reasons you might not be getting chests.

1. Are the S grades in your premade?
2. Have you earned a chest on the champion you were playing this season? One chest per champ per season.
3. Are you on/have you recently been on a restriction of any kind?
